headline: The 49ers and the Saints cancel joint practices because of injuries for San Francisco
description: The San Francisco 49ers and New Orleans Saints canceled their scheduled joint practices for this week with the Niners dealing with several nagging injuries.

headline: Cal Raleigh homers twice, knocks in 5 as Mariners finish off 3-game sweep of Mets with 12-1 win
description: Cal Raleigh hit two home runs, Luis Castillo struck out nine and the Seattle Mariners completed a spirited sweep of the New York Mets with a 12-1 win on Sunday.

headline: Stephen Ames successfully defends Boeing Classic title, birdieing final hole for 1-shot victory
description: Stephen Ames successfully defended his Boeing Classic title Sunday, birdieing the par-5 18th for a 5-under 67 and one-stroke victory over Ernie Els, Steven Alker and Robert Karlsson.

headline: Teoscar Hernández delivers game-winning hit in 10th as Dodgers sweep Pirates
description: Teoscar Hernández drove in three runs, including a game-ending RBI single in the 10th inning, as the Los Angeles Dodgers pulled off a 6-5 victory over Pittsburgh on Sunday, handing the Pirates a season-high seventh consecutive defeat.

headline: Stetson Bennett shakes off 4 INTs, throws winning TD in final seconds as Rams edge Cowboys, 13-12
description: Stetson Bennett rebounded from a four-interception afternoon and threw a 6-yard touchdown pass to Miller Forristall with 4 seconds remaining as the Los Angeles Rams rallied for a 13-12 victory over the Dallas Cowboys on Sunday afternoon in the preseason opener for both teams.

headline: Dingler and Vierling homer, Tigers hold off Giants 5-4 to avoid sweep
description: Dillon Dingler hit his first career home run, Matt Vierling also went deep, and the Detroit Tigers held on to beat the San Francisco Giants 5-4 to avoid the series sweep.

headline: Merrill Kelly strong in return to mound, D-backs stay hot with 12-5 win over the Phillies
description: Merrill Kelly pitched five solid innings in his return from a shoulder injury, Jake McCarthy had three hits and four RBIs, and the Arizona Diamondbacks stayed hot with a 12-5 win over the Philadelphia Phillies on Sunday.

headline: Rublev beats Matteo Arnaldi 6-4, 6-2 after rain delay to reach National Bank Open final
description: Fifth-seeded Andrey Rublev beat Matteo Arnaldi 6-4, 6-2 on Sunday in the National Bank Open semifinals after waiting out a rain delay early in the second set.

headline: Browns reacquire center Nick Harris in trade from Seattle for 6th-round draft pick in 2026
description: Nick Harris has been hiked back to the Browns. Cleveland reacquired the veteran center in a trade from the Seattle Seahawks after backup Luke Wypler suffered a broken ankle in Saturday’s exhibition game against Green Bay.

headline: Steelers, minus Fautanu, expect bounce-back week before preseason game against Buffalo
description: Pittsburgh Steelers coach Mike Tomlin characterized his team’s home preseason loss against Houston last week as a “sloppy” performance filled with inconsistencies and mistakes.

headline: Rockies score 7 runs in the 8th in come-from-behind 9-8 win over the Braves
description: Jake Cave had three RBIs, Charlie Blackmon and Sam Hilliard each had three hits, and the Colorado Rockies mounted a furious comeback to defeat the Atlanta Braves 9-8 on Sunday in the finale of a three-game series.

headline: Malixi completes US Girls’ Junior-Women’s Amateur sweep, beating Talley again in final
description: Rianne Malixi beat Asterisk Talley 3 and 2 to win the U.S. Women’s Amateur on Sunday at Southern Hills, three weeks after routing Talley in the U.S. Girls’ Junior final.

headline: Amanda Anisimova beats Emma Navarro in windy National Bank Open semifinal
description: Amanda Anisimova beat eighth-seeded Emma Navarro 6-3, 2-6, 6-2 on Sunday in an all-American semifinal in the windy National Bank Open.

headline: Fry and Ramírez go deep, Guardians beat Twins 5-3 to earn split of four-game series
description: David Fry and José Ramírez homered, and the Cleveland Guardians held on to beat the Minnesota Twins 5-3 to earn a split of the four-game series between the top two teams in the AL Central.

headline: England captain Ben Stokes helped off field with possible hamstring injury ahead of Sri Lanka series
description: England captain Ben Stokes had to be helped off the field after suffering an injury playing for Northern Superchargers in The Hundred domestic cricket competition.

headline: Stanton, Soto, Judge homer as Yankees hang on for 8-7 win over Rangers
description: Giancarlo Stanton hit a three-run homer after Aaron Judge was intentionally walked in the fifth inning, Juan Soto went deep twice, Judge hit his MLB-best 42nd homer and the New York Yankees hung on for an 8-7 victory over the Texas Rangers on Sunday.
